title: Demoted from G4 to G5 without any warning, normal?
body:
Ive been having a few bad games lately but It was to my knowledge that if you were ever going to get demoted you would get a warning so I wasn't scared to keep playing ranked. But then I just get demoted instantly out of the blue with zero warning, it's really annoying to know you can just be demoted like a flash but actually climbing takes weeks.

Is this normal? because if it is Riot need to get off there ass and fix the ranked system.

replies.body:
No need to be crude or rude my friend, 
> [{quoted}](name=Vhaegor,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=fEGbsdnJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-19T02:01:43.790+0000)
But then I just get demoted instantly out of the blue with zero warning,

As u can see above, you stated that you got banned without a warning, which is why i'd like to introduce you to the "0 LP EXTRAVAGANZA" which is pretty much the state in which an account has 0 LP. Now i'd like to inform you, that as soon as your account hits 0LP you have an immediate chance of being banned on the spot (upon hitting 0 LP) or after losing a game ( or more ) after that.
